title: Floativerse
description: A conceptual digital universe built around the FLOAT methodology, creating an interconnected ecosystem of tools, spaces, and practices for knowledge management and creative thinking.

fullDescription.content: Floativerse is a conceptual digital universe built around the FLOAT methodology, creating an interconnected ecosystem of tools, spaces, and practices for knowledge management and creative thinking. It serves as a meta-project that connects and contextualizes various FLOAT-related projects within a coherent philosophical and practical framework.
Floativerse integrates multiple projects and concepts into a unified ecosystem:

items.title: Floating Digital Grimoire
items.content: The repository for collected knowledge and practices

items.title: FLOAT PKM Setup
items.content: The practical implementation of FLOAT for personal knowledge management

items.title: Floatline Garden
items.content: The space for growing and nurturing ideas

items.title: FLOAT Concept Explorer
items.content: The tool for understanding FLOAT's philosophical foundations

fullDescription.content: Floativerse is structured around several key conceptual dimensions:

items: Ontological Layer - Defining the nature of knowledge and thought
Epistemological Layer - Exploring how we know what we know
Methodological Layer - Providing practical approaches to knowledge work
Technological Layer - Implementing digital tools that embody FLOAT principles
Social Layer - Creating spaces for collaborative knowledge building

fullDescription.content: Floativerse provides multiple ways to navigate and explore the FLOAT ecosystem:

items: Conceptual Map - A visual representation of the FLOAT universe
Project Directory - A catalog of all FLOAT-related projects
Philosophical Guide - An introduction to FLOAT's core concepts
Practical Handbook - Step-by-step guides for implementing FLOAT
Exploration Paths - Curated journeys through the Floativerse based on interests and goals

fullDescription.content: Floativerse serves as both a meta-project that contextualizes individual FLOAT projects and a practical entry point for those interested in exploring and implementing FLOAT methodologies in their own knowledge work and creative practice.
